data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Apart from taking medicine, a healthy diet, regular exercise, and adequate sleep can also help people to cope with illness. To maintain a healthy diet, people should eat regularly throughout the day rather than one or two heavy meals, and choose nutritious foods that they enjoy eating. If they don't feel like eating, they can try having small amounts. Regular exercise promotes health and wellbeing and helps prevent injury. Therefore, it is recommended to do some physical activity every day, even if it is only a small amount. Last but not least, social support can help people maintain their quality of life when they are ill. (106字)
data.referenceText: What are some ways people can recover after being ill?
data.referenceTranslate: 有哪些方法可以让人在生病后恢复?
